short_description: OutlierFilterFit function calculates the lower_percentile, upper_percentile, count of rows and median for all the TargetColumns provided by the user. These metrics for each column helps the function OutlierTransform detect outliers in the input table. It also stores parameters from arguments into a FIT table used during transformation.
long_description: OutlierFilterFit function calculates the lower_percentile, upper_percentile, count of rows and median for all the TargetColumns provided by the user. These metrics for each column helps the function OutlierTransform detect outliers in the input table. It also stores parameters from arguments into a FIT table used during transformation.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.rDescription: The relation that contains input data.
input_tables.description: The relation that contains input data.

argument_clauses.name: TargetColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns for which stats needs to be calculated
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns for which stats needs to be calculated

argument_clauses.name: GroupColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table column for which stats calculation needs to be grouped together
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table column for which stats calculation needs to be grouped together

argument_clauses.name: LowerPercentile
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify lower range of percentile to be used to detect if value is outlier or not
argument_clauses.description: Specify lower range of percentile to be used to detect if value is outlier or not

argument_clauses.name: UpperPercentile
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify upper range of percentile to be used to detect if value is outlier or not
argument_clauses.description: Specify upper range of percentile to be used to detect if value is outlier or not

argument_clauses.name: IQRMultiplier
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the multiplier of interquartile range for 'Tukey' filtering.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the multiplier of interquartile range for 'Tukey' filtering.

argument_clauses.name: OutlierMethod
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify one of the following methods of filtering outliers
argument_clauses.description: Specify one of the following methods of filtering outliers

argument_clauses.name: ReplacementValue
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify one of the following methods of filtering outliers
argument_clauses.description: Specify one of the following methods of filtering outliers

argument_clauses.name: RemoveTail
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the side of the distribution to filter.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the side of the distribution to filter.

argument_clauses.name: PercentileMethod
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specify the teradata percentile methods to be used for calculation.
argument_clauses.description: Specify the teradata percentile methods to be used for calculation.
